title: 391. Andy, Jarred "JT" Taylor, BJ Baldwin & DJ CTI: Uvalde Cop Rehired, No Voting No Vucking & Biden Invokes Possibility of 'Armageddon'
itunes:title: 391. Andy, Jarred "JT" Taylor, BJ Baldwin & DJ CTI: Uvalde Cop Rehired, No Voting No Vucking & Biden Invokes Possibility of 'Armageddon'
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ are joined in the studio by Black Rifle Coffee co-owner Jarred Taylor and off-road racing champion BJ Baldwin. They discuss a Uvalde cop being rehired weeks after the school shooting, the BLK dating app teaming with Trina & Saucy Santana to release a new single to encourage young people to vote, and Biden invoking the possibility of 'Armageddon’ in a Democratic fundraiser speech.
